alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 3:06PM AKST until January 15 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...LONG DURATION SNOW EVENT FOR THIS WEEKEND... .As a system positions itself across the northern gulf, moisture is being steered into the Panhandle, with widespread precipitation enveloping the north and central areas. Through the day warmer temperatures have penetrated inland, with many observation sites rising a few degrees, with this warming trend continuing into Monday afternoon. Expect snow ratios to drop as snow becomes wetter and heavier. As the front moves southeast Monday afternoon it will bring accumulating snowfall to the southern Panhandle. For the north, expecting accumulating snowfall to end sometime Monday night, with clearing moving north to south through the day Tuesday. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 9 inches. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...Until 3 PM AKST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light dry snow will accumulate quickly.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
